column5: Ok, so I am on my way to go pickup my new crossbow...After much deliberation I am getting a carbon express covert SLS. Why not an excalibur... Well for 599, I get 355 fps and a much smaller albeit heavier frame. Anyway, this thread isn't about me. its about this awesome video I saw on the interent while looking at reviews on my new crossbow...   http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BSjCY2kGyfI

Cool design.  Thanks for posting.  Looks like a really heavy weapon.  If you are so weak (injured, elderly,disabled,etc...) that you can't draw a crossbow, then I doubt you would want to lug that beast into the back 40!  I also wonder about the legalities of an auto loading cross bow.  A limit on bolts in the "magazine"??
The limbs look lie they can be to strong either but the deisgn looks pretty sound. Very cool setup none the less.
This one is pretty sweet too...  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QS4RKoRyTik
Vids embedded here have been disabled by request.....   STRANGE  G

works in youtube. they do that because if you watch a video thats embedded the person who published the video doesn't make any money from you watching it. Its an option when you publish a youtube vid.
Now we need an electric musky reel!
Does this mean I can remove the NF tag on this thread?
You can use them for bow fishing.  Definitely fishing related
